Package managment

Class NewOrderScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • managment.NewOrderScreenController
  • public class NewOrderScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for viewing a restuarants new orders that have been recived, or orders that are in the making , or orders that have already been completed we do this with 3 accordions we move between to display to the user the orders status (new,ready to deliver,history)
    Since:
    01.01.2022
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    dorin bahar

      Fields

      accordion for holding new orders
      private javafx.scene.control.Label No_delivery_lbl
      label hidden by default and shown when here is no orders to deliver
      private javafx.scene.control.Label no_history_lbl
      label hidden by default and shown when there is no history
      private javafx.scene.control.Label no_orders_lbl
      label hidden by default and shown when here is no orders

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void createPopUp​(java.lang.String msg)
      this func simulates an sms message to the using by loading a popup that shows in the users screen once an order has been confirmed
      private javafx.scene.control.Button defineButton​(java.lang.String str, Order o, javafx.scene.control.TitledPane pane, javafx.scene.layout.VBox vbox)
      define our button to have the correct action accordion to t he pane it is in if the order is in new orders we set the button to approve the order, send an sms to user and move the order to waiting for delivery if the order is waiting for delivery the button will set the order to be out for delivery and move the order to history accordion
      void initialize()
      func to initalize our controller, here we load all orders by a specific customer when regonize the orders status and set it to the correct accordion

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        func to initalize our controller, here we load all orders by a specific customer when regonize the orders status and set it to the correct accordion

      • defineButton

        private javafx.scene.control.Button defineButton​(java.lang.String str,
                                                 Order o,
                                                 javafx.scene.control.TitledPane pane,
                                                 javafx.scene.layout.VBox vbox)
        define our button to have the correct action accordion to t he pane it is in if the order is in new orders we set the button to approve the order, send an sms to user and move the order to waiting for delivery if the order is waiting for delivery the button will set the order to be out for delivery and move the order to history accordion
        Parameters:
        str - value of button
        o - current order the button is mapped to
        pane - the pane we remove and add once we move between accordions
        vbox - = vbox we remove the button from

      • createPopUp

        private void createPopUp​(java.lang.String msg)
        this func simulates an sms message to the using by loading a popup that shows in the users screen once an order has been confirmed
        Parameters:
        msg - the msg we set in the popup label
